short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions is for professional script writing in Google Docs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is connected with the G-script web application.
It helps the user to interact with their google docs that's connected to their script in the web app, and it open a frame in the google document so the user can transfer to the script connected with that google document.
